item.title: Star Wars: Why Fallen Jedi Make The Most Dangerous Sith Of All
item.description: Not every Sith Lord began as a Jedi in Star Wars, but the Sith who were fallen Jedi had a clear advantage over those who only ever knew the dark side.

item.title: Boondock Saints Director Details One Starâ€™s Outrage At Another Movie's Similarity: "They F-ed Us"
item.description: Exclusive: Boondock Saints director Troy Duffy reflects on how Billy Connolly reacted to learning another crime movie bore striking similarities.

item.title: The Godfather's Biggest Lie Was The Only Reason Francis Ford Coppola's Iconic Movie Actually Worked
item.description: The Godfather wouldn't be nearly the masterpiece it is today if it had been more honest about this important part of the Corleone crime family
